changeSet.author: murthy.y
changeSet.sql: update SMTparameters set sysparmvalue = 'NO_ADJ' where sysparmcode = 'ROUND_ADJ_METHOD';

changeSet.author: murthy.y
changeSet.sql: update SMTparameters set sysparmvalue = 'N' where sysparmcode = 'DISB_REQ_REQUIRED';
